definition: to dry over a fire/to roast
to dry over a fire/to bake
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: Only a sweet and virtuous soul, like seasoned timber, never gives.
sentences.chinese: 只有優美善良的心地，像焙乾的良木永不彎曲。

sentences.english: The pottery was left to make in the hot sun.
sentences.chinese: 陶器放在外貌讓熾熱的太陽烘曬焙乾。

sentences.english: Then left to bake in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 然後在陽光下焙乾成型。

definition: black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
mole cricket/Gryllolaptaptidae, family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera (a serious agricultural pest)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
to mash/to beat to a pulp
variant of 黃檗|黄檗[huang2 bo4]
radish seed (used in TCM to treat indigestion)
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
